problem.message: ESLint warning [camelcase]: Identifier 'my_message' is not in camel case. ( var my_message = 'Hello World!'; ), Line: 2 Column: 9
ESLint warning [no-alert]: Unexpected alert. ( alert(my_message); ), Line: 3 Column: 5
